EYB:ForceStance.NAME: Force Stance
DESCRIPTION: #g+{0} #gStrength, NL #r-{1} #rFocus, NL #r-{1} #rDexterity. NL On Enter: #yBoost #yForce. NL On Exit: Gain {2} #yTemp. #yHP.

EYB:AgilityStance.NAME: Agility Stance
DESCRIPTION: #g+{0} #gDexterity, NL #r-{1} #rStrength, NL #r-{1} #rFocus. NL On Enter: #yBoost #yAgility. NL On Exit: Draw {2} card next turn.

EYB:IntellectStance.NAME: Intellect Stance
DESCRIPTION: #g+{0} #gFocus, NL #r-{1} #rStrength, NL #r-{1} #rDexterity. NL On Enter: #yBoost #yIntellect. NL On Exit: Deal {2} damage.
